Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Instant feedback can help me remedy mistakes I may have missed or let me rethink the work that I did in a new perspective to better understand it.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI will elaborate and go in-depth with their explanations during feedback which may end up being mostly filler but it is still concise enough. Teachers may choose to be very concise or too brief, or have little to no explanations.
